column34:
I am highly interested in developing the skill of problem-solving because I recognize its significant impact on personal and professional success. Firstly, problem-solving skills empower me to overcome challenges and find effective solutions in various aspects of life. 
Additionally, problem-solving skills enable me to think critically and analytically. I believe that by honing these skills, I can make well-informed decisions and navigate complex situations more effectively. I am drawn to the idea of being able to approach problems from different perspectives, analyze them systematically, and generate innovative solutions.

column10: Baseline Reflection on your Problem Solving skills
column31: While I was waitressing as a part-time job, I had the chance to work with a manager that showed great problem solving skill. She was capable of effectively assessing, analyzing and resolving a problem, even in high-pressure and time-sensitive situations, in order to always upheld a very high standard and ensure client satisfaction. She demonstrated quick thinking, flexibility,  great adaptabilty and creativity.
column34:
I believe that problem solving is a highly valubale skill both for my personal and my professional life. 
I would like to develop this skill further in order to be even more confident in facing problems in my personal life, and being able to effectively assess, analyze and resolve them.  
In addition, I am interested in pursuing a career in consulting, and problem-solving lies at the core of a consultant's role. I am eager to develop further my ability to analyze a problem and offer pertinent insights, as well as effective, creative, and competitve solutions.
